object.name: removeUserVerification
object.description: Removes verification from a user who is currently verified on behalf of the organization represented by the bot. Returns True on success.
object.html_description: Removes verification from a user who is currently verified on behalf of the organization represented by the bot. Returns True on success.
object.rst_description: Removes verification from a user who is currently verified `on behalf of the organization <https://telegram.org/verify#third-party-verification>`_ represented by the bot. Returns :code:`True` on success.

annotations.description: Unique identifier of the target user
annotations.rst_description: Unique identifier of the target user
annotations.name: user_id
